tortuous.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a tortuous path, stream, road etc has a lot of bends in it and is therefore difficult to travel along
tortuous.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a tortuous path over the mountains to Kandahar
tortuous.translation[0].definitions[1].d: complicated and long and therefore confusing
tortuous.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The book begins with a long, tortuous introduction.
